0x35F743B5.name: REGISTER_TRACK_JUNCTION

params.name: trackIndex
params.description: The track index a train should be on

params.name: trackNode
params.description: The node a train should be on

params.name: newIndex
params.description: The new track index for a train to be placed on

params.name: newNode
params.description: The new track node for a train to be placed on

params.name: direction
params.description: The direction a train should be traveling for this junction

0x35F743B5.description: Registers a track junction that when enabled will cause a train on the defined trackIndex, node and direction to change its current track index and begin traveling on the new node
0x35F743B5.resultsDescription: The track junction's handle or -1 if invalid.
